text: Toronto experienced the largest outbreak of SARS in North America , with investigation of 2 , 132 potential cases and identification of 23 , 103 contacts of SARS patients who required quarantine [ 11 ] . Post - SARS investigations have detected myriad adverse effects among those quarantined : significant feelings of uncertainty , anxiety , and isolation [ 14 ] ; experience of stigma , fear , and frustration [ 15 ] ; symptoms of depression and post - traumatic stress disorder [ 16 ] ; and loss of anonymity [ 17 ] .
